data.text:
Mary Lorene SIMPSON was born (date unknown).

Spouse: John L. Mitchell DAWKINS. Mary Lorene SIMPSON and John L. Mitchell DAWKINS were married on 13 July 1952 in Moberly, Randolph, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Shelbina, Shelby Co., Missouri.

Mary Lou SIMPSON was born about 1941. Parents: Henry Lee SIMPSON and Alice Leona DAVIS.

Spouse: Harry Dean RITCHIE. Mary Lou SIMPSON and Harry Dean RITCHIE were married on 31 July 1957 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. The bride was of Chillicothe, the groom of Richmond, Ray Co., Missouri. John Ritchie, father of Harry, gives consent. Mrs. Henry Simpson, mother of Mary, gives consent. Children were: Terri RITCHIE, Randy Dean RITCHIE.

Mathew A. SIMPSON was born on 10 February 1842 in Marin Co., Kentucky. He died on 21 April 1921 at the age of 79. He was buried in Purdin, Linn, Missouri.

Spouse: Laura C. SHIPP. Laura C. SHIPP and Mathew A. SIMPSON were married on 28 November 1876 in Livingston Co., Missouri. Children were: Albert W. SIMPSON, James W. SIMPSON, Carl Lee SIMPSON, Elizabeth May "Lizzie" SIMPSON, Maggie SIMPSON, Rhoda Florence SIMPSON.

May SIMPSON was born (date unknown). Parents: William B. "Willie" SIMPSON and Mary Nancy LYONS.Michael Harrison "Mike" SIMPSON was born on 6 January 1950. He died on 9 August 2002 at the age of 52 in Eugene, Lane, Oregon. There was cremation. Parents: William Leroy "Bill" SIMPSON and Virginia Rose PRIDEMORE.

Spouse: Nancy Joan MERRYFIELD. Nancy Joan MERRYFIELD and Michael Harrison "Mike" SIMPSON were married on 25 October 1969 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. The bride was of Utica, the groom of Chillicothe. Mrs. Harry Renfro, grandmother of Michael Simpson, gives consent. Children were: Jenifer Lee SIMPSON.

Millie M. SIMPSON was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Lewis E. STEWART. Millie M. SIMPSON and Lewis E. STEWART were married. Children were: Edith Margaret STEWART.

Moreen SIMPSON was born (date unknown). Parents: Guy Dewitt SIMPSON and Nancy Ann "Anna" HUMPHREY.

Spouse: STARRETT. Moreen SIMPSON and STARRETT were married.

Nancy SIMPSON was born (date unknown). Parents: John SIMPSON and Betty Lou STOTTLEMEYER.Nancy Judith SIMPSON was born on 29 April 1848. She died on 8 April 1883 at the age of 34. She was buried in Latham, Logan, Illinois. Parents: James D. SIMPSON and Mary A. WHITESIDE.

Spouse: Sylvester ALLISON. Nancy Judith SIMPSON and Sylvester ALLISON were married. Children were: Jennie Victoria ALLISON.

Nile Samuel SIMPSON was born on 28 November 1915 in Linn Co., Missouri. He died on 18 February 1972 at the age of 56 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. He was buried in Linn Co., Missouri. Burial was in Bear Branch cemetery, north of Brookfield. Parents: Guy Dewitt SIMPSON and Cora Ann WARREN.Nilia SIMPSON was born (date unknown). Parents: John SIMPSON and Betty Lou STOTTLEMEYER.O. E. SIMPSON was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Myrtle E. DOWELL. Myrtle E. DOWELL and O. E. SIMPSON were married.

Omer SIMPSON was born on 1 July 1885. He died on 4 July 1953 at the age of 68. He was buried in Highland Cemetery, Caldwell, Missouri.

Spouse: Helen Enola GIBSON. Helen Enola GIBSON and Omer SIMPSON were married on 21 April 1934.

P. A. SIMPSON was born in Cedar Co., Missouri.

Spouse: Martha MILLER. Martha MILLER and P. A. SIMPSON were married. Children were: Emily Jane SIMPSON.

Pamela Gail SIMPSON was born about 1947.

Spouse: Jimmy Ray SWEAT. Pamela Gail SIMPSON and Jimmy Ray SWEAT were married on 29 June 1963 in Pattonsburg, Daviess, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Pattonsburg. Mrs. Mae Sweat, mother of Jimmy, consents to this marriage. Mrs. Goldie Simpson, mother of Pamela, gives her consent to this marriage.

Patricia Ann "Patsy" SIMPSON was born on 22 June 1931 in Livingston Co., Missouri. She died on 27 January 2011 at the age of 79. Parents: Seth SIMPSON and Hazel G. GROSSMAN.

Spouse: Loren Dale MATTOX. Patricia Ann "Patsy" SIMPSON and Loren Dale MATTOX were married on 22 May 1949. Children were: Scott Douglas MATTOX, Roger MATTOX.

Patsy Sue SIMPSON was born (date unknown). Parents: Pearl Robert SIMPSON and Mary Louise BURTON.

Spouse: Gary Gordon JENKINS. Patsy Sue SIMPSON and Gary Gordon JENKINS were married on 20 April 1962 in Hickory, Livingston, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Chillicothe. Kathleen Jenkins, mother of Gary, consents to this marriage. Children were: Gerald Gordon JENKINS, Craig Steven JENKINS, Randall Dwayne JENKINS, Kathleen Louise JENKINS.

Pearl Junior SIMPSON was born on 23 June 1926 in Fountain Grove, Linn, Missouri. He died on 17 August 1985 at the age of 59 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. He was buried on 21 August 1985 in Edgewood Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. He served in World War II. Parents: Pearl Robert SIMPSON and Mary Louise BURTON.

Spouse: Virginia May ROBINSON. Virginia May ROBINSON and Pearl Junior SIMPSON were married on 10 January 1948 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Chillicothe. Children were: Donald Ray SIMPSON, Cathy SIMPSON, Cheryl SIMPSON.

Pearl Robert SIMPSON was born on 5 October 1903 in Livingston Co., Missouri. He died on 14 November 1981 at the age of 78 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. He was buried on 17 November 1981 in Edgewood Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. He was a trucker in 1940. Parents: Henry Seymour SIMPSON Jr. and Dora Elizabeth BROOKS.

Spouse: Mary Louise BURTON. Mary Louise BURTON and Pearl Robert SIMPSON were married on 25 November 1924 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Chillicothe. Children were: Pearl Junior SIMPSON, Helen Marie SIMPSON, Joyce Nadine SIMPSON, Billy W. SIMPSON, Buddy Robert SIMPSON, Shauneen Ann SIMPSON, Charlotte Jean SIMPSON, Wanda Lee SIMPSON, Patsy Sue SIMPSON, Marsha SIMPSON.

Penny Leigh SIMPSON was born on 25 August 1961 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: William Leroy "Bill" SIMPSON and Sharon Ann HOWERTON.

Spouse: Ronald Keith SNIDER. Penny Leigh SIMPSON and Ronald Keith SNIDER were married on 1 June 1979 in Hamilton, Caldwell, Missouri. Children were: Rachel Leigh SNIDER, Jamie Lynn SNIDER, Tessa Lynelle SNIDER.

Randall SIMPSON was born (date unknown). Parents: John SIMPSON and Betty Lou STOTTLEMEYER.Rhoda Florence SIMPSON was born on 6 July 1889 in Bedford, Livingston, Missouri. She died on 5 January 1982 at the age of 92 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. She was buried on 7 January 1982 in Resthaven Memorial Gardens, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Mathew A. SIMPSON and Laura C. SHIPP.

Spouse: Archie Woodruff BAILEY. Rhoda Florence SIMPSON and Archie Woodruff BAILEY were married on 18 May 1910 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. Children were: Elton Simpson BAILEY, Mary Elizabeth BAILEY, Opal Frances BAILEY.

Robert SIMPSON was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Edith Lee SOUTHERS. Edith Lee SOUTHERS and Robert SIMPSON were married on 12 March 1914 in Grundy Co., Missouri. The bride was of Harris, Sullivan Co., the groom of Dunlap in Grundy Co. Children were: Hazel Dorothy SIMPSON.

Robert SIMPSON was born (date unknown). Parents: James SIMPSON and Beulah FLAGG.Ronald LeRoy SIMPSON was born on 24 August 1932 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. He died on 9 June 1967 at the age of 34 in Linn Co., Missouri. He died in an auto accident near Meadville. His home was in Chillicothe. He was buried on 12 June 1967 in Resthaven Memorial Gardens, Livingston, Missouri. He was a singer and western swing band leader. Parents: Henry Lee SIMPSON and Alice Leona DAVIS.

Spouse: Thelma Fern ENGLEMAN. Thelma Fern ENGLEMAN and Ronald LeRoy SIMPSON were married on 10 March 1951 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. Children were: Ronald Leroy SIMPSON Jr., John Edward SIMPSON, Connie Fern SIMPSON, Lisa Annette SIMPSON.

Ronald Leroy SIMPSON Jr. was born on 7 January 1953 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. He died on 3 June 2011 at the age of 58 in Kansas City, Jackson, Missouri. He was buried on 7 June 2011 in Resthaven Memorial Gardens, Livingston, Missouri. He graduated from Chillicothe High School in 1971.

Parents: Ronald LeRoy SIMPSON and Thelma Fern ENGLEMAN.

Spouse: Gayle Louise ROBBINS. Gayle Louise ROBBINS and Ronald Leroy SIMPSON Jr. were married. Children were: Sterling SIMPSON, Bridget SIMPSON.

Ruth Ilea SIMPSON was born in April 1916. Parents: Carl Lee SIMPSON and Ruth Frances BEEVER.Ruth R. SIMPSON was born on 12 May 1913 in Livingston Co., Missouri. She died on 9 December 2002 at the age of 89 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. She was buried on 11 December 2002 in Resthaven Memorial Gardens, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Henry Seymour SIMPSON Jr. and Dora Elizabeth BROOKS.

Spouse: Henry SCHNEITER. Ruth R. SIMPSON and Henry SCHNEITER were married on 7 October 1934 in Ames, Story, Iowa.

Spouse: Thomas B. "Tom" ENGLAND Jr.. Ruth R. SIMPSON and Thomas B. "Tom" ENGLAND Jr. were married on 25 July 1981.

Samuel F. SIMPSON was born (date unknown). Parents: Samuel R. SIMPSON and Pearl KING.Samuel R. SIMPSON was born on 11 September 1881 in Grundy Co., Missouri. He died on 4 June 1966 at the age of 84 in Jamesport, Daviess, Missouri. He was buried on 7 June 1966 in South Evans Cemetery, Grundy, Missouri. Parents: Thomas SIMPSON and Mary Ann WESTON.

Spouse: Pearl KING. Pearl KING and Samuel R. SIMPSON were married in March 1914 in Grundy Co., Missouri. The marriage record is faded. Children were: Alice Marie SIMPSON, Doran L. SIMPSON, Samuel F. SIMPSON.

Serenity Dawn SIMPSON was born on 26 October 2006. Parents: Brandon Scott SIMPSON and Micki MILLER.Seth SIMPSON was born on 4 June 1902 in Carroll Co., Missouri. He died on 15 April 1985 at the age of 82. He was buried on 18 April 1985 in Coloma Cemetery, Carroll, Missouri. He served in the U. S. Navy. Parents: Abe L. SIMPSON and Mary S. PARSLEY.

Spouse: Hazel G. GROSSMAN. Hazel G. GROSSMAN and Seth SIMPSON were married on 16 May 1929 in Carrollton, Carroll, Missouri. Children were: Patricia Ann "Patsy" SIMPSON, Douglas SIMPSON.

Seven Taylor SIMPSON was born on 27 February 2006. He died on 27 February 2006 at the age of 0. Parents: Kristopher Kelly SIMPSON and Missy Ann MAUSCH.Shanda Sue SIMPSON was born on 20 September 1968 in Brookfield, Linn, Missouri. Parents: William Leroy "Bill" SIMPSON and Sharon Ann HOWERTON.

Spouse: Bryant Dale MCCRACKEN. Shanda Sue SIMPSON and Bryant Dale MCCRACKEN were married on 20 June 1986 in Mooresville, Livingston, Missouri. They married in the Mooresville Methodist Church. Children were: Bryant Dale MCCRACKEN Jr..

Spouse: DAVIS. Shanda Sue SIMPSON and DAVIS were married. Children were: Benjamin Wesley DAVIS.

Spouse: Terrance Raymond "Terry" FEENEY. Shanda Sue SIMPSON and Terrance Raymond "Terry" FEENEY were married on 14 September 1997. Children were: Cody Lon FEENEY.

Shauneen Ann SIMPSON was born about 1938 in Missouri. Parents: Pearl Robert SIMPSON and Mary Louise BURTON.

Spouse: Ernie DENTON. Shauneen Ann SIMPSON and Ernie DENTON were married. Children were: Ernie Dale DENTON, Rhonda Gayle DENTON, Dennis Neil DENTON.

Shirley SIMPSON was born on 16 March 1931 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. She died on 27 January 2010 at the age of 78 in Springfield, Greene, Missouri. She was buried in Springfield, Greene, Missouri. She sang on the radio in Kansas City. Her singing partner, Millie, formed the duet Millie and Sue. Parents: Henry Lee SIMPSON and Alice Leona DAVIS.

Spouse: Willie NELSON. Shirley SIMPSON and Willie NELSON were married in 1963. They were divorced.

Spouse: Lewis Edward JONES. Shirley SIMPSON and Lewis Edward JONES were married on 5 June 1948.

Spouse: Biff COLLIE. Shirley SIMPSON and Biff COLLIE were married.

Stephanie SIMPSON was born (date unknown). Parents: Donald Jason SIMPSON Jr. and Della June ARMS.Sterling SIMPSON was born (date unknown). Parents: Ronald Leroy SIMPSON Jr. and Gayle Louise ROBBINS.Telpha SIMPSON was born (date unknown). Parents: John SIMPSON and Betty Lou STOTTLEMEYER.Thomas SIMPSON was born in England.

Spouse: Mary SNOWDEN. Mary SNOWDEN and Thomas SIMPSON were married. Children were: Anne Elizabeth SIMPSON.

Thomas SIMPSON was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Mary Ann WESTON. Mary Ann WESTON and Thomas SIMPSON were married. Children were: Samuel R. SIMPSON.

Thomas C. SIMPSON was born on 19 March 1862 in Canada. He died on 23 October 1928 at the age of 66 in Hamilton, Caldwell, Missouri. He was buried in Highland Cemetery, Caldwell, Missouri.

Spouse: Winifred JOHNSON. Winifred JOHNSON and Thomas C. SIMPSON were married in 1882.

Spouse: Rosamond A. "Rozzie" EDWARDS. Rosamond A. "Rozzie" EDWARDS and Thomas C. SIMPSON were married on 28 September 1897 in Kingston, Caldwell, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Hamilton. They were divorced.

Toni Lynn SIMPSON was born on 15 April 1956. She died on 7 May 1998 at the age of 42 in Liberty, Clay, Missouri. Parents: William Leroy "Bill" SIMPSON and Helen Louise NEW.

Spouse: Martin PHILLIPS. Toni Lynn SIMPSON and Martin PHILLIPS were married. Children were: Channa PHILLIPS.

Spouse: Paul CHUR. Toni Lynn SIMPSON and Paul CHUR were married. Children were: Michael Anthony Albert CHUR.

Vicky Lynn SIMPSON was born on 8 April 1964 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. She died on 31 August 2020 at the age of 56 in Chilicothe, Livingston, Missouri. She was buried on 4 September 2020 in Mooresville Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: William Leroy "Bill" SIMPSON and Sharon Ann HOWERTON.

Spouse: Steve PREWITT. Vicky Lynn SIMPSON and Steve PREWITT were married on 25 August 1990 in Mooresville, Livingston, Missouri. Children were: Dylan Reed PREWITT, William Spencer SIMPSON.

Wanda Lee SIMPSON was born about 1940. Parents: Pearl Robert SIMPSON and Mary Louise BURTON.

Spouse: Loren Gene SICKLER. Wanda Lee SIMPSON and Loren Gene SICKLER were married on 25 May 1956 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Chillicothe.

Wayne SIMPSON was born (date unknown). Parents: Guy Dewitt SIMPSON and Nancy Ann "Anna" HUMPHREY.Willard SIMPSON was born (date unknown). Parents: James SIMPSON and Beulah FLAGG.William SIMPSON was born (date unknown). Parents: John SIMPSON and Betty Lou STOTTLEMEYER.William SIMPSON was born (date unknown). Parents: Carl Lee SIMPSON and Alma Edna WITTY.William B. "Willie" SIMPSON was born on 6 January 1862 in Illinois. He died on 7 April 1924 at the age of 62 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. He was buried on 9 April 1924 in Wheeling Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Cyrus Lee SIMPSON and Mary Jane LONGFELLOW. Parents: Isaac SIMPSON and Mary RHOADES.

Spouse: unknown . Unknown and William B. "Willie" SIMPSON were married. Children were: Martha SIMPSON, Mary SIMPSON.

Spouse: Mary Nancy LYONS. Mary Nancy LYONS and William B. "Willie" SIMPSON were married on 20 November 1883 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. Cyrus Simpson, father of William, gives consent. Eliza J. Lyons, mother of Mary, gives consent. Children were: May SIMPSON, Benton Leroy "Ben" SIMPSON, Maggie SIMPSON, Ella M. SIMPSON, William L. SIMPSON, John W. SIMPSON, Georgia SIMPSON.
